import { css, cx } from '@emotion/css' import { useState } from "react"; import { Button, Container, Icon, Menu, Segment, Sidebar } from "semantic-ui-react"; function MobileHeader(){ const [sidebarOpened,setSidebar]=useState(false); function handleSidebarHide () { setSidebar(false) } function handleToggle () { setSidebar(true) } return (
Home Work Company Careers Log in Sign Up
) } export default MobileHeader
